name: Niftgen
intro: Use NFTs to build, grow and monetize your brand
introduce: Niftgen is an NFT hub that facilitates community engagement that lets NFT creators better build and monetize their brands. On Niftgen, content creators will receive constructive feedback for their work, when fans rate and comment on their work, which will allow creators to improve their content. Content creators will also be able to connect with their fans directly on the platform via Niftgen’s chat feature, leading to faster and easier communication between fans and creators.
